Full service R&D platform for microbe-based biomanufacturing

Lab to Pilot Scale-Up Services

Work with Our Experts

With over 15 years of hands-on industrial fermentation experience and decades of expertise in microbial strain engineering, we support emerging startups and academic researchers by offering services in process optimization, scale-up and scale-down, production demonstration, and technology transfer.

Your Process, Our Platform

Leverage our equipment and expertise.

Fermentation capacity

Mini benchtop : 0.2 L (×8) (coming soon)

Small benchtop : 3 L (×4), 5 L, 15 L (×2), 20 L (×2)

Steam-in-place : 10 L, 100 L, 200 L (coming soon)

Downstream Processing

Continuous centrifugation (coming soon), tangential flow filtration, spray drying, lyophilization

Monitoring & Analysis

Biomass analysis, cell imaging, sugar & metabolite profiling, protein quantification

Organisms we have worked with

Bacteria, budding yeasts, methylotrophic yeasts, fungi

Products we have experience with

Biopolymers, biofertilizers, biopesticides, biofuels, probiotics, recombinant proteins, insulin, enzymes, acids, plasmid DNA, biological controls

Modes and Control

Run in batch, fed-batch, or continuous mode.

Control by dissolved oxygen, pH, temperature, and off-gas.
